remarks: Construct a topological space from a topology and vice-versa.  We say that ` A ` is a topology on ` U. A ` .  (This could be proved more efficiently from ~ istpsOLD , but the proof here does not require the Axiom of Regularity.)  (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2006.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
